column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last summer , I decided to visit my friend Emily .
#text=She lives very far from me : I live in the middle of the country , and she lives on the coast .
#text=So , I had to visit by flying there in an airplane .
#text=I got up very early in the morning so that I could drive to the airport - it was still dark outside when I left my house .
#text=I parked in the lot , picked up my duffle bag and slung it across my shoulders , and walked into the airport .
#text=I went to the ticket counter to check in at one of the kiosks , so that the airline knew I would be flying that day , and then I had to go through the security line .
#text=I was flying on a weekday , so the line was very long with people who were flying for work , even though it was still early in the morning .
#text=I checked my email while I waited , sent my bags through the x-ray machine , and finally stepped out into the main terminal of the airport .
#text=It was bright and sunny , with lots of people rushing everywhere .
#text=I walked over to my gate , and waited for my section of the plane to be called to board .
#text=The flight crew got to my section , and I walked onto my plane , being careful to hold my bags so that they would n't bump into the people who were already sitting down .
#text=I put my luggage in the overhead compartments and made sure it was secure so that it would n't fall on anyone , and then I sat down in my assigned seat and put my seatbelt on .
#text=I pulled out a book I brought with me , and read until the plane was ready to take off .
#text=I listened to the flight attendant 's safety instructions , and then the plane started to move - with a mighty jerk , the wheels left the ground and we were flying .
#text=It was very loud with the noise of the engine .
#text=A few minutes after we took off , the pilot came on the intercom and gave us some details about the weather and our flight time .
#text=Then , the flight attendants walked past in the aisles with their cart , and offered me a drink .
#text=I got a cup of coffee , and drank it while I read my book .
#text=A few hours later , the pilot came on the intercom and let us know we were getting ready to land .
#text=I put my book away , turned off my phone like the flight attendants asked , and made sure everything was secure .
#text=After a few minutes of waiting on the ground , a gate opened up , and we were allowed to get up and stretch , and get our bags out of the compartments .
#text=A few minutes later , I walked off the plane with my bags , and walked out to the waiting area to meet my friend .
#text=Flying in a plane was an interesting experience .
